thread.title: Oscars 2017: Jennifer Aniston, Warren Beatty, Octavia Spencer join presenters
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Jennifer Aniston, Warren Beatty, Octavia Spencer join presenters

author: Oliver Gettell
title: Oscars 2017: Jennifer Aniston, Warren Beatty, Octavia Spencer join presenters
text:
Jonathan Leibson/Getty Images; Todd Williamson/Getty Images; Nicholas Hunt/Getty Images 
Itâ€™s last call for Oscar presenters, and Jennifer Aniston, Warren Beatty, and Octavia Spencer are answering. 
The three actors are among the final group of presenters to be announced for the 89th Academy Awards, which will take place Sunday evening in Hollywood. 
Rounding out the lineup are Jason Bateman, Sofia Boutella, Matt Damon, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Fox, Ryan Gosling, Salma Hayek, Taraji P. Henson, Dev Patel, Seth Rogen, Meryl Streep, and Vince Vaughn. 
Several presenters are also nominees: Spencer for Hidden Figures (best supporting actress), Gosling for La La Land (best actor), and Patel for Lion (best supporting actor). 
Previously announced presenters can be found here and here . 
Jimmy Kimmel is hosting the ceremony, which will be broadcast on ABC beginning at 7 p.m. ET/4 p.m. PT. Show Full Article
